description:
http://anidb.net/ch115893 [Joe] gets his motorcycle stolen by a boy named http://anidb.net/ch115897 [Mio] and ends up at a settlement for immigrants where he runs into http://anidb.net/ch115892 [Chief] again. 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: La desesperacion da coraje a los cobardes
Zetsubou wa Okubyoumono ni Yuuki o Ataeru
絶望は臆病者に勇気を与える
